price: 111. (Pemuka-pemuka) itu menjawab, “Tahanlah (untuk sementara) dia dan saudaranya dan utuslah ke kota-kota beberapa orang untuk mengumpulkan (para pesihir),
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَأَرۡسِلۡ فِي ٱلۡمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū arjih wa-akhāhu wa-arsil fī al-madāini ḥāshirīna
